awardEventDetails.title: 2005 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT marches to the tap of its own therapist's pencil, often finding itself so far outside the traditional form of television comedy that it stands alone in its own genre. Richly imagined by Mitchell Hurwitz and the creative ensemble, each week the show's lovably twisted characters give us an uproarious, glorious trip to the nuthouse they call home. Amid the laughs is brilliant commentary on celebrity and a gleefully wicked satire of the American family we all know too well.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT is a quirky comic voice in the grand tradition of MISTER ED and GREEN ACRES. Entertaining and distinctive in its documentary style, this eccentric look at the extremes of American family life delivers the all-too-rare belly laugh and instills new hope for growth and maturity in today's stunted comedy environment.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2005 Nominee DVDX Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Overall DVD, TV Program (Including All Bonus Features)

awardEventDetails.for: Best Casting for TV, Comedy Episodic

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Winner Artios Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Casting for TV, Comedy Pilot

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Winner Future Classic Award
awardEventDetails.description: Jason Bateman - Will Arnett - Michael Cera - David Cross - Portia de Rossi - Tony Hale - Alia Shawkat - Jessica Walter - Mitchell Hurwitz (executive producer) - David Nevins (executive producer)

AFI Awards, USA

2005 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT marches to the tap of its own therapist's pencil, often finding itself so far outside the traditional form of television comedy that it stands alone in its own genre. Richly imagined by Mitchell Hurwitz and the creative ensemble, each week the show's lovably twisted characters give us an uproarious, glorious trip to the nuthouse they call home. Amid the laughs is brilliant commentary on celebrity and a gleefully wicked satire of the American family we all know too well.)
2004 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT is a quirky comic voice in the grand tradition of MISTER ED and GREEN ACRES. Entertaining and distinctive in its documentary style, this eccentric look at the extremes of American family life delivers the all-too-rare belly laugh and instills new hope for growth and maturity in today's stunted comedy environment.)
